== Atholi (CT) (627400) ==

Atholi (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 21.06 sq. km. and harbouring 6833 households with total population of 28213 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 445 km. Male population is 13061 and female population is 15152. Scheduled Caste population is 4483 and Scheduled Tribes population is 49. Census Location Code of the town is 627400<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 20 km. Railway station is at Chemancheri at a distance of 6 km.
